before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3j1ae","text":"prepare your media and bottle and plates, and make sure to turn on the laminar flow hood 15 minutes ahead of culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"112kb","text":"this protocol uses a microwave to sterilize and polymerize culture media for bacterial propagation in 3 minutes, the whole protocol can be done in 15-20 minutes without the need for an autoclave and waiting an hour for it to heat to  which can consume a lot of electricity and time, this method is straight forward and clean and gave good results of growth without pollution of non desired bacteria, it can be used for liquid cultures and solid cultures as well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":233,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"25rpr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"121","unit":10}}}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"8iokl","text":"this method should only used for routine culture, it is not advised for novel bacteria or any other important first culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1g6","text":"use heat gloves when you are taking the culture bottle out of the microwave ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"2bsuk","text":"-Shareef, S.A., Hamasaeed, P.A., \u0026 Ismaeil, A.S. (2019). Sterilization of Culture Media for Microorganisms Using a Microwave Oven Instead of Autoclave. Rafidain Journal of Science.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":152,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dlou","text":"-Scheppler, Judith A., \"Watts Cooking: Using a Microwave to Prepare Bacterial Media for Inquiry-Based Experiments\" (2014). Staff Publications \u0026 Research. 2. https://digitalcommons.imsa.edu/sir_staffpr/2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":123,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pn94","text":"-Bhattacharjee MK, Sugawara K, Ayandeji OT. Microwave sterilization of growth medium alleviates inhibition of Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans by Maillard reaction products. J Microbiol Methods. 2009 Aug;78(2):227-30. doi: 10.1016/j.mimet.2009.06.004. Epub 2009 Jun 12. PMID: 19524624.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5kge","text":"measure the desired quantity of media powder you want with a sensitive scale, ex:   of  inside a heat resistant glass bottle with a lid with proper volume (size 250ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5qm2a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5vum9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5biqs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"group_guid":"47729C44D665413783FBC84C59CC2683","guid":""}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FE48233A1DD611EF84A90A58A9FEAC02","height":212,"id":472457,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"images.jpeg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnmb9vup.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnjb9vup.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnkb9vup.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnib9vup.webp","width":238}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cv9n","text":"add the water you need, preferably distilled but tap water works fine for me, ex: .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9qpk2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8ien","text":"close the lid tightly to create pressure, and mix by shaking in your hand for   until the powder is dissolved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bd9g5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33n9j","text":"put the media in the microwave n the highest degree for  , stop the microwave if you see bubbles appearing, let the bottle rest for few seconds then continue the process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c6il1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f74e","text":"you may need an extra minute to make sure everything is correct, the media will look yellow and transparent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":16,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fvkm","text":"take out the bottle with the media and let it cool under the flow of tap water, be sure to rotate the bottle under water until it becomes easy to touch with your hand, that means it reached  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":190,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bo6k8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60-65","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cbpma","text":"sterilize the bottle by rubbing alcohol on it, and take it inside the laminar flow hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f55ht","text":"add your desired antibiotic like ampicillin  (  )to the media and shake inside the hood gently to spread it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":33,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fg6ra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"10 ug/ml","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86ht7","text":"pour the media inside petri dishes, about   is enough, then wait for about   until it cools off and solidify.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1v5ad","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10-15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"171o3","text":"culture on your plates containing the sterilized media with the microwave method, then close the plates and place them in an incubator   to grow your culture for 16-24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":162,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":135,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bamg6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

steps.section: results are here shown after 24 hours of growth
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2b249","text":"you can visually see the solid LB agar plates with grown cultures and no pollution of other bacteria.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6eotq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjssg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5lf0a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qett","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D8983E301DD811EF84A90A58A9FEAC02","height":388,"id":472461,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"484tg\",\"text\":\"LB agar plate sterilized and prepare in the microwave with bacterial growth PLYSs\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"WhatsApp Image 2024-05-29 at 19.15.52 (1).jpeg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnrb9vup.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnpb9vup.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnqb9vup.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnnb9vup.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: results are here shown after 24 hours of growth
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d5fc9","text":"i also tried a liquid LB broth and it gave good results with no pollution with very good growth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70cdj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5al2m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"366BE2C21DD911EF84A90A58A9FEAC02","height":389,"id":472465,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"7fpta\",\"text\":\"microwaved LB broth with PlySs culture it gave a very good density of turbidity from grwoth.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"WhatsApp Image 2024-05-29 at 19.15.52.jpeg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnvb9vup.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpntb9vup.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnub9vup.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qpnsb9vup.webp","width":550}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"3c08a","text":"do not put any metal in the microwave or aluminum foil ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6ogd","text":"make sue the bottle you use is microwavable and heat resistant without any cracks or loosen lid, and leave at least one half of the bottle empty, and stop the microwave in case you hear or see anything wrong. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
